title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7861.1 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7861.1 - General

State Regulations
(a) This Part sets
forth the information filing requirements, as determined by the board or by the
chair as authorized by the board, applicable to major steam suppliers and any
other entity that the board deems appropriate to collect such
information. (b) Quantities of
steam sales should be reported in thousand pounds of steam or mlbs. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7861.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
